data.text: Have a happy and healthy birthday my dear son! Hope your day is as wonderful as you are.
We may not be perfect parents but we are lucky to have a perfect son. Happy birthday son!
Happy birthday my precious son! You are loved, today, tomorrow and always
Happy birthday my precious son! You are loved, today, tomorrow and always
Every day you find a way to bring a smile to my face and happiness to my heart. Happy birthday my dearest son!
My love and adoration for you is endless, you will be forever cherished. Happy birthday my son!
Happy Birthday, Son! We have watched you grow into an amazing man. May the year ahead continue to exceed your expectations!
Happy Birthday. You are smart, funny, thoughtful, and best of all, a terrific son! I wish you a great day filled with presents and great desserts.
Dear son, today is your big day! I feel so blessed and lucky to have you as my child. Happy birthday!
Happy birthday, son! We have watched you grow into an amazing man. May the year ahead continue to exceed your expectations!
You are a wonderful person and deserve a wonderful life. We are always there for you, my son. Wish you a very happy birthday.
Happy Birthday To My Wonderful Son. No matter how big you get or how far you go, I will always be here, right beside you
Wishing a very happy birthday to our awesome son. We wish that all your dreams and hopes will come true
Happy birthday to a son who is good-looking, intelligent, charming and really wonderful. Have a great day dear boy
Son, no matter how old you get, youâ€™ll always be my little prince. Hope you have a truly wonderful birthday.
